name: Wyprawy Kupca
overview: Wyprawy Kupca is a Polish language turn-based trading simulation. The goal of the game is to accumulate 15 million of currency in order to save the daughter before the indicated deadline will pass. The game is divided into turns, each turn represents a single month. The player begins with a ship of 500 units capacity (can be extended in the yard) and 50 thousand currency. The player may trade goods in nine cities and purchase shares, gamble in the casino or smuggle illegal stuff, according to the rule "buy cheap and sell expensive".
